naslov: Prodaja kuće i velike parcele - drugi red uz more, Nečujam, Šolta (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo u prodaji kuće sa okućnicom od 550m2 smještene drugi red uz more u Nečujmu, na otoku Šolti. Lokacija je predivna, mirno okruženje s pogledom na more, do same plaže je svega par koraka, a sve je okruženo prirodom i zelenilom. Radi se o samostojećoj kući od 128m2 koja je za renovaciju, a nalazi se na parceli od 550m2, postoji i mogućnost kupnje 1200m2 zemlje… tako da bude jedna velika zaokružena cjelina po cijeni od 650.000€, dok sama kuća i parcela od 500m2 iznose 450.000€. Ove dvije parcele imaju ogroman potencijal s obzirom na bajkovitu poziciju, mogućnost izgradnje ville s bazenom kao unosan turistički posao, a i jednako tako za ugodno ljetovanje u vikendici okruženoj mediteranskim biljem i morem. KONTAKT: 0915615115 (ŽELJANA) We are mediating the sale of a house with a garden of 550m2, located second row by the sea in Nečujmo, on the island of Šolta. The location is wonderful, a peaceful environment with a view of the sea, the beach itself is only a few steps away, and everything is surrounded by nature and greenery. It is a detached house of 128m2 that is for renovation, and it is located on a plot of 550m2, there is also the possibility of buying 1200m2 of land... so that it will be one large rounded unit at a price of €650,000, while the house itself and a plot of 500m2 amount to €450,000 . These two plots of land have enormous potential given the fairytale location, the possibility of building a villa with a swimming pool as a lucrative tourist business, and equally for a pleasant summer vacation in a cottage surrounded by Mediterranean plants and the sea. CONTACT: 0915615115 (ŽELJANA)
naziv_agencije: Studio Aura j.d.o.o. Agencija za nekretnine i consulting
